title: How Can I Protect My Savings From Inflation? (Hour 1)
description:
George Kamel & Dr. John Delony discuss:

Building a home vs. buying one,

Preparing for med school,

Selling the house to pay off debt,

Protecting savings from inflation.


Support Our Sponsor:

PODS Moving & Storage

NetSuite
